page.shortlink: api client api a5 u object assign method

argument.name: object
argument.description: The object or array to assign properties to.

argument.name: objectSrc
argument.description: The object or array to assign properties from.

argument.name: keepOriginal
argument.description: Whether or not to keep the original properties (if they exist) in the object being assigned to.

page.description: Assign the properties from a source object to another object.
